metadata.title: CVE-2018-20669 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
An issue where a provided address with access_ok() is not checked wasdiscovered in i915_gem_execbuffer2_ioctl indrivers/gpu/drm/i915/i915_gem_execbuffer.c in the Linux kernel through4.19.13. A local attacker can craft a malicious IOCTL function call tooverwrite arbitrary kernel memory, resulting in a Denial of Service orprivilege escalation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20669` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-115-generic - 4.15.0-115.116
linux-image-4.15.0-115-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-115.116
linux-image-4.15.0-115-lowlatency - 4.15.0-115.116
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-115-generic - 4.15.0-115.116
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-115-lowlatency - 4.15.0-115.116
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1068-raspi2 - 4.15.0-1068.72
No subscription required
